column4: this is a stupid question, but how do I get the headers installed for gcc?  I installed the g++ package, but I'm not sure what to look for next
gcc is just the compiler. If you mean the C library headers needed for building programs, they're in 'libc6-dev'.
I'd recommend installing the "build-essential" virtual package to pull in all the base packages needed to build stuff (like 'make' and 'g++')
